title: REQUIREMENTS for New Project
content:
# Requirement Document for: New Project

## 1. Introduction
This document outlines the core requirements for the proposed solution.

## 2. Functional Requirements
- **User Authentication**: System must support secure login/signup.
- **core Feature**: The system shall implement the main logic for New Project.
- **Dashboard**: User dashboard to view metrics.

## 3. Non-Functional Requirements
- **Performance**: < 200ms response time.
- **Security**: Data encryption at rest and in transit.

title: PLANNING for New Project
content:
# Project Plan
    
## Phases
1. **MVP**: Core features of New Project.
2. **Phase 2**: Advanced Analytics.

title: ARCHITECTURE for New Project
content:
# Technical Architecture

## Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14
- **Backend**: Node.js Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
